tasks.task: Drive a tractor to plant corn
subtasks: Adjust steering wheel to direct the tractor
Operate the tractor's accelerator pedal to move forward
Use hand levers to steer the planter
Monitor the planting depth of corn seeds
Adjust the planter's seed opener depth as needed
Ensure proper seed coverage with soil
Lubricate the planter mechanism during operation if necessary

tasks.task: Tend to corn crops during the growing season
subtasks: Monitor corn plants for pests and diseases
Use a blossoming stick to remove corn tassels
Check for proper pollination and silk emergence
Assess plant emergence and stand quality
Operate a combine harvester to cut corn stalks
Separate corn kernels from the stalks
Clean harvested corn by removing debris
Load corn onto a truck or train for transport
Monitor moisture levels of corn kernels
Condition corn for proper drying if needed

tasks.task: Clean and prepare machinery for storage
subtasks: Disassemble the planter and clean individual components
Lubricate moving parts of the machinery
Store the planter in a protected area
Check for and fix mechanical issues before the next season

tasks.task: Drive a tractor to plant corn
subtasks: Adjust steering wheel to direct the tractor
Use hand levers to steer the planter
Use a stick to remove tassels
